nodes.text: The Kessa system, also known as the Kessel system, was a three-planet system that contained the irregularly shaped planet of Kessel. It was located near the black hole cluster known as the Maw.

Sometime during the Galactic Civil War, Hawk Carrow and Nagraoao were prisoners in the Spice Mines of Kessel. Roark Garnet took his ship, the Dorion Discus, to the Kessel system to rescue his friends, but was stopped by a Star Destroyer for inspection. Garnet bribed a Navy officer to let him go.
